org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems

Class ProblemFilterClassCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems.ProblemFilterClassCriteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProblemFilter

    public class ProblemFilterClassCriteria
extends Object
implements IProblemFilter
    IFilter problems based on their class; the filter supports a negative set (don't accept any instances of a given class) and a positive set (only accept instances of a given class).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProblemFilterClassCriteria(Class<?>... classesToFilterOut)
      Construct a purely negative filter.
      ProblemFilterClassCriteria(Set<Class<?>> classesToFilterOut, Set<Class<?>> classesToRequire)
      Construct a filter with positive and negative requirements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProblemFilterClassCriteria

        public ProblemFilterClassCriteria(Class<?>... classesToFilterOut)
        Construct a purely negative filter.
        Parameters:
        classesToFilterOut - - the classes (which may be superclasses) of problems that should be excluded from the filtered set.

      • ProblemFilterClassCriteria

        public ProblemFilterClassCriteria(Set<Class<?>> classesToFilterOut,
                          Set<Class<?>> classesToRequire)
        Construct a filter with positive and negative requirements.
        Parameters:
        classesToFilterOut - - the classes (which may be superclasses) of problems that should be excluded from the filtered set.
        classesToRequire - - the classes (which may be superclasses) that problems in the filtered set must extend/instantiate.

    • Method Detail

        Add a (super)class to be rejected.

        clazz - - the class to be rejected.

        public void removeRejectedClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Remove a (super)class to was have been rejected.
        Parameters:
        clazz - - the class that is now allowed.

      • addRequiredClass

        public void addRequiredClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Add a (super)class to be required.
        Parameters:
        clazz - - the class to be required.

      • accept

        public boolean accept(ICompilerProblem p)
        Description copied from interface: IProblemFilter
        Determines if the specified ICompilerProblem passes the filter.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface IProblemFilter
        Parameters:
        p - ICompilerProblem to check
        Returns:
        true if specified ICompilerProblem passes the filter, false otherwise.
